attributes.action: GIVE ALL Unemployed people in receipt of unemployed benefits, COVID-19 payment.
attributes.additional_details:
www.wronginmadness.com says Through ZERO (0) Fault of their own... The SAME Unemployed Vulnerability Groups & Individuals ...in SAME Area or SAME Household...  are receiving 'Differences' in government financial assistance' for SURVIVING COVID-19.

The capacity for a) Mental Illness, b) Suicide and c) Unsatisfactory life, are horror platforms for now or in the future.  

ITS HARD TO BUDGET unemployment benefit, & 'Keeping COVID Safe' ...by keeping the windows open in cold weather is extra costs.
attributes.background:
www.wrongsinmadness.com wants the government to Urgently pay out the £20 COVID-19 pay. To ALL unemployed people in receipt of a state unemployment benefit like 'JSA'. NOT just the unemployed on Universal Credit.

Please pay immediately & pay Extra money for Hardship endured because of govt wrongs.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318691
